screenReader.title: Screen Reader Adjustment
screenReader.description: Makes the site compatible for screen reader users

keyboardNavigation.title: Keyboard Navigation
keyboardNavigation.description: Enables users to navigate by keyboard, without using the mouse

smartNavigation.title: Smart Navigation
smartNavigation.description: Enables users to navigate the site by numeric keys

textReader.title: Text Reader
textReader.description: Reading the site's text aloud, in supported browsers

voiceCommands.title: Voice Commands
voiceCommands.description: Executing commands with a microphone, in supported browsers

increaseDecreaseFont: Increase and Decrease the font size
BlinksBlockingDescription: Stops blinking and flashing of moving elements.
AddCaptionsDescription: Add captions to videos and audio.
ReadableFontDescription: Convert the site's fonts to [sans-serif] and readable ones.
ImageDescriptionsDescription: Displays image descriptions in a floating window.
EnlargeButtonsDescription: Enlarges buttons to meet WCAG accessibility regulations.
ReadableModeDescription: Displays the site's contents in a new window clearly and readable.
TextMagnifierDescription: Increase the content chosen by the cursor, shown in a tooltip.
PageStructureDescription: Generate a list of page landmarks, headers, and links.
MuteMediaDescription: Mutes all sounds and vocal elements.
ReadFocusDescription: Light up a selected paragraph on the page by hovering with the mouse across the page.
ReadingGuideDescription: Create a virtual bar that follows the cursor to improve the reader's focus.
DictionaryDescription: Displays a dictionary definition of words on the page.
VirtualKeyboardDescription: Enable users to type contents using the mouse.
monochromeDescription: Convert to black and white colors
darkDescription: Changes the site's background to black, with bright fonts
lightDescription: Changes the site's background to white, with dark fonts
lowSaturationDescription: Reduce color saturation to minimal levels
highSaturationDescription: Increase color saturation to maximum levels
howChatHelps: How can this chat help me?
ScreenReaderAdjustmentDes: Makes the site compatible with screen reader users.
PageStructureDes: Create a list of page landmarks, headers, and links.
KeyboardNavigationDes: Enables users to navigate using the keyboard, without using the mouse.
SmartNavigationDes: Enables users to navigate the site using the numeric keys on the keyboard.
VoiceCommandsDes: Executes commands using the microphone, in supported browsers.
EnlargeButtonsDes: Enlarges buttons to meet accessibility requirements according to WCAG guidelines.
DarkHighContrastDes: Changes the site's background to black, with bright fonts.
BrightHighContrastDes: Changes the site's background to white with dark fonts.
ContrastModeDes: Changes the site's colors to contrasting colors.
LowSaturationDes: Decreases the intensity of the colors for less emphasized content.
MonochromeDes: Converts the colors to black and white.
HighSaturationDes: Increases the intensity of colors for emphasized content.
ImageDescriptionsDes: Displays image descriptions in a floating window.
ReadableFontDes: Converts the site's fonts to [sans-serif] and readable ones.
TextMagnifierDes: Increases the content selected by the cursor, shown in a tooltip.
BlinksBlockingDes: Stops blinking and flashing of moving elements.
MuteMediaDes: Mutes all sounds and vocal elements.
ReadFocusDes: Lights up a selected paragraph on the page by hovering with the mouse.
ReadingGuideDes: Creates a virtual bar that follows the cursor to improve the reader's focus.
TextReaderDes: Reads the site's text aloud, in supported browsers.
ReadableModeDes: Displays the site's contents in a new window clearly and readable.
